00036 // helpers for EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP
00037 // IMPORTANT: if you change "__onstartup_func_" below, linkall.pl must also be updated!
00038 #define __ONSTARTUP_FUNC  MAKE_UNIQUE_WITHIN_FILE(__onstartup_func_)
00039 #define __ONSTARTUP_OBJ   MAKE_UNIQUE_WITHIN_FILE(__onstartup_obj_)
00040 
00041 // helper
00042 #define __FILEUNIQUENAME__  MAKE_UNIQUE_WITHIN_FILE(__uniquename_)

00053 #define EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(CODE)  \
00054   namespace { \
00055     void __ONSTARTUP_FUNC() {CODE;} \
00056     static ExecuteOnStartup __ONSTARTUP_OBJ(__ONSTARTUP_FUNC); \
00057   };
00058 
00059 
00065 class SIM_API ExecuteOnStartup
00066 {
00067   private:
00068     void (*code_to_exec)();
00069     ExecuteOnStartup *next;
00070     static ExecuteOnStartup *head;
00071   public:
00072     ExecuteOnStartup(void (*code_to_exec)());
00073     ~ExecuteOnStartup();
00074     void execute();
00075     static void executeAll();
00076 };
